price: Nárrales [¡oh, Mujámmad!] la historia de Abraham que se menciona en el Libro. Era un hombre veraz, un Profeta.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقٗا نَّبِيًّا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi ib'rāhīma innahu kāna ṣiddīqan nabiyyan
